message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $13,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you, given its features and benefits.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $9,500?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here. $9,500 is really pushing it, but I'm willing to let it go for $10,750.  That's my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid $9,500 is my final offer. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price.
